root.name: Accele Brid
root.description: OverviewAccele Brid is a behind-the-back shooter released for the Super Famicom on November 26, 1993 by Tomy, exclusively in Japan. Players can choose one of three large robots, and then control it as it flies down a large pipe, shooting, kicking, and punching enemies as the game progresses. An unofficial English translation patch was released by Aeon Genesis on May 28th, 2002.Playable CharactersCharacterStatsNitikaHeight - 2.62 mWeight - 0.99 tMax Speed - 192.6 kmBeliwsHeight - 2.20 mWeight - 2.05 tMax Speed - 166.6 kmSilver MareHeight - 2.51 mWeight - 1.08 tMax Speed - 171.1 km
